LanguageData.tab.settings.desc: Enable and disable optional settings which effect which information is displayed
LanguageData.tab.gui.desc: Methods which are run on gui
LanguageData.tab.modder.desc: Methods which have been added by modders via Analyzer.xml
LanguageData.top.pause.analyzer: Pause/Unpause profiling that the analyzer is done, this is not equivalent to unpatching
LanguageData.top.search: Search by name or time to filter which entries show
LanguageData.top.gc.tip: This will show a rough estimate of the memory consumed and thrown away at a given time
LanguageData.top.fps.tip: This will show your calculated frames per second
LanguageData.top.tps.tip: This will show your ticks per second, ticks are the metric the game uses to quantiy time passing, multiple ticks can happen per second, the game aims to reach 60tps at 1x
LanguageData.logs.name: Name
LanguageData.logs.max.desc: Sort the rows by the maximum (MS) peak the method has reached
LanguageData.logs.av.desc: Sort the rows by the average (MS) the method is reaching
LanguageData.logs.percent.desc: Sort the rows by relative percent in the category
LanguageData.logs.total.desc: Sort the rows by total (MS) impact
LanguageData.logs.name.desc: Sort the rows in alphabetical order
